attributes.action: Bring back hanging for paedophiles, serial murderers and serial rapists (if the proof is strong enough; dna, cctv, fingerprints).
attributes.additional_details:
These people ruin the lives not only of those they prey on but they're entire family and friends.
That could mean hundreds of people deeply affected by one sick individual.

These people do not deserve the rights of the rest of society and should be destroyed. The country is in enough of a state financially without the burden of keeping these monsters alive.

Please sign to make this country a safer one for all.

Thank you.
